question: Which Bollywood actress will be honoured at Toronto Film Festival?
explanation: Priyanka Chopra to be honoured at Toronto Film Festival. According to the Hollywood Reporter, the 35-year-old 'Desi' girl will be the guest of honour at the fundraiser event on September 6. The funds raised from the TIFF gala will help fund talent development programs at the Canadian festival to get more women behind and in front of the camera.
